page.title: 11B'NESS/SOLWAY.HOUSES & WORK.
page.content: {EMPLOYMENT}in the area is in agriculture and related industries; British Sidac in Wigton; defence installations; in offices, shops, Health Services, teaching & the media (e.g. Television in Carlisle.) The self-employed include a joiner, an electrician, a bookbinder & an antique dealer. Jobs are difficult to find for young people. However, 2 of this year's 5 school-leavers already have jobs,(agriculture & hairdressing) & 1 has a College place.{HOUSES}are a mixture of 17th.C. cottages built of cobble & dressed sandstone; 18th.C. small houses; a pair of Victorian villas; 12 modern bungalows & 3 modern houses. Many houses are rendered & some stone is reused from Roman fort. Of 10 farms, 3 are in village, one a 15C. listed fortified manor. Most properties owner-occupied.
